text: "The Power of Four" is a joint anthem for the British and Irish Lions, a rugby union team. It was created by Neil Myers. ==Words== From the four corners of our lands We're united, hand in hand Together We're stronger We join and proud we stand Now the day has come, we are one Standing tall for our Lions' call We're stronger Together We are the power of four. ==Sources== Category:Rugby union Category:Sports team songs
title: The Power of Four
